Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents including disposal group and discontinued operations

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: pension and other postretirement benefit contributions
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from issuance of medium term notes
proceeds from repayments of short term debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance of shares under incentive and share based compensation plans including stock options
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire equipment on lease
payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: payments to acquire interest in joint venture
proceeds from sale and collection of finance receivables
proceeds from sale of productive assets
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale and maturity of marketable securities

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts and other receivables
increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
increase decrease in other operating assets
increase decrease in other operating liabilities
increase decrease in residual value guarantees and deferred revenues
increase decrease in sales type finance lease and dealer direct loan receivables
increase decrease in wholesale receivables on used equipment
Depreciation and Amortization: depreciation and amortization equipment on operating leases and other
depreciation and amortization of other assets
depreciation on equipment on operating leases and other amortization
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: provision for loan and lease losses
provision for loan lease and other losses
